website_summaries.verdict: This comfortable, streamlined hardshell backpack with reflective safety piping is not just for motorcyclists.
pros: Water-resistant PVC shell reinforced with carbon-fiber for strength and durability
Well-padded heavy-duty Oxford polyester back provides good body fit
Straps and buckles designed not to scratch helmet or motorcycle gas tank
cons: Bigger people have complained that straps are too short

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect, although expensive it is worth it's weight in gold and here's why we gave it to our son for Christmas 2017 he was elated about it and used it every time he went riding. In August 2018 he was riding and lost control of his bike. He was wearing this backpack. This backpack protected his back from some extremely bad road rash, it broke in the process but not before saving my son. When he gets back on his bike again we will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Really made for a smaller person. I'm 6'3" 260 ...
customer_reviews.text: Really made for a smaller person. I'm 6'3" 260. Shoulder straps are alittle tight even all the way let out. Backpack will not sit up. Didn't think that would be an issue. But the pack is always falling over due bottom cut at an angle
customer_reviews.author: steven campo

customer_reviews.title: So much more than cool design
customer_reviews.text: Wow - one of the best purchases I've made for my motorcycle! Has a curved compartment for a lens, has a hydration pocket as well as a laptop! I love using this to transport my computer and work materials! You can also put an impressive amount of material in this bag! It also expands two inches with a zipper too - so you can fit more stuff! Has reflective text and lines on the back for safety at night!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit me but seller was awesome with the return policy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was to big for me so I couldn't use it but the seller was understanding and with no argument agreed to return my money back to me. They even were fast in the return of my money. Product looked great but like I said it didn't fit me right no matter how much I tried to adjust the straps. other than that it looked great and was very BIG and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: I Love It! It's big enough for a few overnights. Great shell design.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pack and big enough to pack for a few overnights. It's got a gray shell and the design is great. I'm a big guy, 6'3" and it fits me and it's adjustable. I love it. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: To long
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a bit to long, when I am riding it pushes up against the base of my neck. I am a shorter person at 5'6 however I have never had an issue with a bag being to long like this one. Still it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Too Big, But Nice
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the shipping was fast, and the bookbag itself is very nice, however, it's really, really big. It's almost like carrying a suitcase on your back. I'm 5'2, 130 lbs, and it is too big for me. It really sucks because I've been watching this one for a while, and it's really nice. Unfortunately, I can't ride with this, so I had to send. It back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional... Around  Town or Open Road
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is the best, The hard shell makes it totally aerodynamic on your back with minuim wind deflection. It is well made, zippers move with ease and total functionality. It looks good up close and afar.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good looking versus practicability
customer_reviews.text: It does look good. But it is smaller than it looks. The geometry doesn’t fit well for carry on your back and found it difficult to access the interior in normal circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: OAG

customer_reviews.title: Alot of money for not much usable space
customer_reviews.text: Big bag but not enough usable space. Can't justify keeping this over my Burton bag that has everything I want in it and is much smaller and just feels better on my back. Returning for refund!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Good bag, Great Price. Might not be quite the quality\as durable as the better known brand, but everyone comments on how good it looks and the price is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Persson

customer_reviews.title: Cool pack
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few summers now, other than some normal wear, and maybe a few more pockets, I and very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is very happy with it it holds when she wants it holds it firmly I think it was a little overpriced and it looks cheap
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I read a review before buying about zipper problems and took the chance anyway and right out of the box the zipper was messed up very disappointing considering there is no option to return the product
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great riding backpack! I have fairly broad shoulders and most backpacks can be a bit uncomfortable to wear but this backpack is comfortable to wear and holds tons of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Devin M.

customer_reviews.title: Straps dont extend out very far for a bigger person
customer_reviews.text: First of all I loved the backpack. But it was built for a smaller person while I'm built like a linebacker, so not really a good buy If your bigger/broader because the straps dont extend very far out, and the strap on mine snapped before I was going to go for a ride
customer_reviews.author: connor heath

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very sturdy with many compartments and has a ton of storage
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: A 10” iPad fits ok!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is nearly perfect! Although it’s just a little too small to fit a common size 15 inch laptop It is pretty rugged and you can barely tell you’re wearing it virtually no wind drag
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Motorcycle Backpack. Not for Large Guys.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack. Great value and has pretty much every feature you could ask for. My only complaint is that the waist belt is not long enough. I am 6'3" and over 200 pounds. The strap is just not long enough to accommodate larger frames.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I agree with some of the reviews that for a wide chest probably the chest strap won’t fit, but for me it was just fine. The back is very confortable to wear. The straps could be a little bit more cushioned, but still they’re ok. The sturdiness is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: drcofino

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good pack but the visor holder is too small for a shoei or icon visor so it barely fits without tearing the holder
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Leupp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pack is perfect for holding a lot of stuff. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nels

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with a minor problem
customer_reviews.text: Some of the fixing belts are too short, so when you pack it full with your stuff, you can't use all belts. (I'm 185 cm / 88 kg, so I v m not a fat guy. May be it is made for little 65 kg people, I do not know... ) But it's a nicely designed product and produced in high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zoltan Koncz

customer_reviews.title: Big enough
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is bigger than expected looks great and Reflect At night Which helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Osmer j flores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected fits really good n the shape is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Easy to use. May not be for bigger guys..
customer_reviews.text: Like pretty much everything about it. Only negative was the waist belt wasnt long enough. If your bigger than a 38 waist. You will need to remove it. Still works great though
customer_reviews.author: Jason h.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Over two months of use and everything is great. Comfortable and reliable. It says is not waterproof but I have had the chance to drive under heavy rain and no water or humidity was found inside the backpack. I’m not saying is waterproof but it worked perfectly under rainy weather.
customer_reviews.author: leivad

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought it for my boyfriend and he loved it.. It is really spacious and it looks super chic. Thanks, that was money well spent 😊
customer_reviews.author: Marie f.

customer_reviews.title: Small sized - not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: Small sized - not suitable for medium to large sized males.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bag similar to this about a week ago but this one is supreme it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Theodore E Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Only suits to medium build ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a present. And recipient really liked it. However, this suitcase seems a little bit small for large body riders
customer_reviews.author: IO

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the bag but had to return it first day ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the bag but had to return it first day that i took it out for a ride the zipper started to rip. Its a shame cause i loved it!
customer_reviews.author: CuestaC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is Great but I wish it could have been just a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: James A Jones

product_meta.title: CUCYMA Motorcycle Backpack Motorsports Track Riding Back Pack Stealth No Drag Molded
feature_bullets: *Product capacity： 30 liter cargo capacity ,Size:H20” x W14” x D7” high,Internal mesh pocket keeps small items separate
*Product material： Carbon fibre design,PVC/1680D Oxford,Rugged, water-resistant nylon construction with reinforced Carbon fibre PVC body and lid to hold shape even when empty.

*Safety & Comfortability: Reflective piping for additional nighttime visibility,Streamlined single shot molded exterior is water resistant and will not deform from wind shear. Shoulder gasket conforms to body and increases aerodynamics. Bolstered back foam profile increases air ventilation. Soft neck shoulder straps increase comfort while riding and will not scratch helmet exterior

*Product stability： High-Density weave adjustable belt, High thickness Fully adjustable and removable no slip sternum strap, suoerior quality electroplate zipper,strong wear resistance,strong corrosion resistance,portable material confort user friendly design Ergonomic, padded and fully adjustable riding specific shoulder straps with quick release exit buckle. Concealed aerodynamic carry handle. Helmet Hang Buckle.
